badge: What kind of coupon. ex: 'In-Store Only'
discount: The big number on the coupon. Percentage off, etc.
ends: Date for when the event ends.
extra: true or false (no quotes!) -- this adds the 'EXTRA' tag at the top of the coupon.
image: URL of image for offer or promo drawer version of coupon
link: URL for 'shop now' or 'learn more' button.
upc: UPC code that will be used to generate barcodes.
